name: Sanity Is Reality
description:
Sanity Is Reality is a game in which your existence (and to an extent your reality) depends solely on your mental health, all else secondary.

In most games, you stop existing when you die, or in other words, your existence is tied to your physical health, by those standards, you are long gone. Here, your existence is anchored to your mental health. If you go insane, you, and the world around you, will collapse.

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:

1.     click "Download Now", if you aren't donating, click the "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" button

2.     unzip the folder

3.     if your antivirus is acting up, turn it off. I honestly have no idea why my antivirus insists on deleting the game I made, it doesnt happen with my other games, not my problem.
